And here‚Äôs the thing: we certainly didn‚Äôt always agree, but he debated issues without being disagreeable. He pushed and pulled on policy issues in a way that made me stronger and better; his team took his cues from him and were wonderful for my team to work with.

In addition to being in the MI delegation together, we‚Äôre both in the Problem Solvers Caucus, the only bipartisan group in congress that meets every week to work on legislation. It‚Äôs been there, among 28 Democrats & 28 Republicans, that Fred‚Äôs leadership really shined through.
